attributes.action: Make the NHS vaccination recognisable from the EU for people travelling there.
attributes.additional_details:
The European fully jabbed citizens have a green pass while those vaccinated in the UK have to always purchase a test for everything when in Europe. You need a test from doing simple things such as going to the cinemas, eating indoors to travelling by all means of transport
Being fully vaccinated by the same regognised companies, there should be no discrimination between for instance a fully jabbed British citizen and a fully jabbed Italian citizen. It is clear discrimination and it all starts back at the fact that the UK chose to leave the European Union. During these times the price is paid by simple citizens- especially those that have to travel to the European Union to see their families.
attributes.background: Make a deal with the European Union so that they recognise our vaccine and stop asking for tests.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on this topic:

Seek to agree upon equivalence of NHS Covid pass and European Covid Green Pass
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593188
